parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From a derivative of mneme; to exercise memory, i.e. Recollect; by implication, to punish; also to rehearse.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: (a) To lead, (b) To think, be of opinion, suppose, consider.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To look at attentively, gaze at, consider. From ana and theoreo; to look again at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) a way out, escape, (b) result, issue. From a compound of ek and the base of basis; an exit.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Plural

str2: Dealing with other men, conduct, life, behavior, manner of life. From anastrepho; behavior.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To imitate, follow. Middle voice from mimos; to imitate.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
